page.title: 13THE RACE COURSE
page.content:
The present road layout does not follow the course. The mile course ran from the{Plough Public House, opposite{Northolt Station,}to the top of{Dabbs Hill}Lane, where the stands were located.
One of the most successful of the {Northolt Race Course jockeys,}now well into his seventies, lives in a house built on the finishing line. There are a few other ex-Course workers living on the Estate, but the majority of those who earned their living on the Race Course did not return from the Second World War.
The Estate boasts a pair of{Iron Gates which are the same as those through which the Queen rides at Royal Ascot.
